Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 5 Spell DC: W: 13
Spells:
Alarm (W1 Abju): R30' Entry into a 20' cube by a non-designated creature triggers an audible or mental alarm for 8 hr [R]
Antipathy/Sympathy (W8 Ench): R60' Target object repels or attracts specified creatures for 10 dy
Banishment (W4 Abju): R60' Banishes target to home or a demiplane (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Clairvoyance (W3 Divi): R1 mile Self gains choice of remote sight or hearing through an invisible sensor for conc up to 10 min
Color Spray (W1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd [+Level affects +2d10 HP of targets]
Comprehend Languages (W1 Divi): Self understands all languages for 1 hr [R]
Continual Flame (W2 Evoc): Touched emits a heatless torch flame
Dancing Lights (W0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and move 60'/rd for conc up to 1 min
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force and becomes dust if reduced to 0 HP (Dexterity neg); disintegrates large or smaller objects and magical forces [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Fire Bolt (W0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Foresight (W9 Divi): Touched gains immunity to surprise and Adv on attack, ability, and saving throws, and foes suffer Disadv on attacks, for 8 hr
Geas (W5 Ench): R60' Target carries out self instructions (Wisdom neg) for 30 dy [+Level extends duration to 1 yr/permanent at level 7/9]
Globe Of Invulnerability (W6 Abju): 10' radius blocks spells up to level 5 for conc up to 1 min [+Level blocks +1 spell level]
Hold Monster (W5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes target creature (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hypnotic Pattern (W3 Illu): R120' Creatures in a 30' cube become charmed (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min
Leomund's Secret Chest (W4 Conj): Self may move a touched 12' cube chest to and from the Ethereal Plane for 60+ days
Locate Object (W2 Divi): Self learns location of specified object or type w/in 1000' for conc up to 10 min
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Sword (W7 Evoc): R60' Spell attack w/force weapon inflicts 3d10 HP force, and weapon moves 20'/rd, for conc or 1 min
Nondetection (W3 Abju): Willing touched or object gains immunity to divination for 8 hr
Rary's Telepathic Bond (W5 Divi): R30' 8 willing targets may communicate mentally for 1 hr [R]
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Silent Image (W1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube illusion (Investigation detects) for conc up to 10 min
Suggestion (W2 Ench): R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 8 hr
Teleport (W7 Conj): R10' Target object or self and 8 allies teleport any distance
Wall Of Fire (W4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20'x1' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) w/in 10' of chosen side for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Magic Notes:
Abjuration Savant: May copy abjuration spells into spellbook for half cost
Arcane Recovery: May recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest 1/long rest
Arcane Ward: Abjuration casting creates a ward around self that can absorb 39 HP (long rest ends); if taken to 0 HP, abjuration casting restores 2x spell level HP to ward
Dual-Focused: Maintain concentration on two spells simultaneously (DC 10 + number of rd Constitution to maintain)
Flash Recall: Swap prepared spell 1/short rest
Improved Abjuration: +6 abjuration spell ability checks
Mystic Conflux: May attune 4 items
Projected Ward: R30' May use Arcane Ward to absorb damage to others
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Signature Spells: May cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Spell Mastery: May cast chosen W1 spell and W2 spell at will
Spelldriver: Cast additional level 1 - 2 spell/rd
